thread.title: Baltimore clarifies clause in police settlements
thread.title_full: Baltimore clarifies clause in police settlements - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Baltimore clarifies clause in police settlements
text: Mayor Stephanie Rawlings-Blake's administration has adjusted a clause to better explain the restrictions on people who accept money to settle lawsuits over allegations of police misconduct. While the longer "nondisparagement clause" doesn't add more restrictions, it specifies that those who sign... ...
